EmailTemplate.name: 08_25_2015 VMworld Europe #3.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name}}, 2 Chances Left to Win 2 Tickets To VMworld Europe
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-sweeps-2015&utm_content=05202015> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
VMTurbo is giving 2 more lucky winners two Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2015 in San Francisco. The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld is our industry's biggest stage. We will be there, and we want you there too. We will be giving away a pair of tickets on June 19th and July 10th. Enter today for your chance to win! <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-sweeps-2015&utm_content=06082015>
- Who? 2 Winners (maybe you!) - What? 2 VMworld 2015 Passes - Where? San Francisco, California - When? August 30th - September 3rd
-The VMTurbo Team
